section.heading: Protection of waters; cesspools and drains

content.p:
ยง 13-0345. Protection of waters; cesspools and drains.
 1. Sludge, acid or refuse from oil works, sugar houses or other
manufactories, sewage or any substance injurious to shellfish culture or
fish, or which shall in any manner affect the flavor, odor, color, or
sanitary condition of such shellfish so as to injuriously affect the
sale thereof, or which shall cause any injury to the public and private
shell fisheries of this state, shall not be placed or allowed to run
into waters of the state in the marine district.
 2. Garbage, cinders, ashes, oils, acids, sludge or refuse of any kind
shall not be thrown, dumped or permitted to run into the waters of the
marine district.
